授業目的: This course aims at developing students' academic research and writing skills to pursue further studies.
到達目標: Students will be albe to research and write an academic paper on topics related to UN and Foreign Affairs.
関連科目: Internship in the United Nations and Foreign Affairs institutions. Career Seminar for International Organizations.
授業の概要・背景: This course substitutes internship at UN and foreign affairs with similar level of competency development that will contribute future job seeking at global devel. Students select a globa issue or an organization as a theme of research and prepare a research plan, which include a research question, background and method. Based on the research prepare a final paper and presentation which also include results and conclusion.
授業方法: Individual coaching to guide and advice on self research and learning.

トピック.授業計画1: Coaching sessions will be conducted on demand basis. Students select a globa issue or an organization as a theme of research and prepare a research plan, which include a research question, background and method. Based on the research prepare a final paper and presentation which also include results and conclusion.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to conduct individual research on daily basis.
